short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser action with a popup dump of all bookmarks, including search, add, move, edit and delete.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app makes it easier to work with bookmarks in your Chrome. With this application, you can search for bookmarks, move bookmarks to other folders, sort by name and delete.For convenient operation, open optoins
